mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `heatmeter_bind` (`heatmeter_id`) SELECT h.`id` FROM `heatmeter` h LEFT JOIN `heatmeter_code` hc ON h.`id` = hc.`heatmeter_id` LEFT JOIN `building_code` bc ON hc.`building_code_id` = bc.`id` WHERE 1 = (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `building_code` bc1 LEFT JOIN `heatmeter_code` hc1 ON bc1.`id` = hc1.`building_code_id` WHERE hc1.`heatmeter_id` = h.`id`) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM `heatmeter_code` hc2 LEFT JOIN `building_code` bc2 ON hc2.`building_code_id` = bc2.`id` WHERE bc2.`building_id` = bc.`building_id` AND bc2.`code` = bc.`code` AND bc2.`organization_id` = bc.`organization_id` AND hc2.`heatmeter_id` != h.`id`)
